trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> .

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> e assina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Ele usa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> para localizar o item selecionado no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: The items that were unselected during this event.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que foram desmarcados durante esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The items that were selected during this event.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que foram selecionados durante esse evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> e assina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Ele usa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> para localizar o item selecionado no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains the items that were selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista que contém os itens que foram selecionados.

trans-unit.source: The items that were selected since the last time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que foram selecionados desde a última vez que o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: The current object along the event's route.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual ao longo da rota do evento.

trans-unit.source: Performs the proper type casting to call the type-safe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventHandler" /> delegate for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Executa a conversão de tipo adequada para chamar o representante <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventHandler" /> fortemente tipado para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> e assina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Ele usa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> para localizar o item selecionado no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains the items that were unselected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista que contém os itens que foram desmarcados.

trans-unit.source: The items that were unselected since the last time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que foram desmarcados desde a última vez que o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> ocorreu.
